This is one of many phone games where there is questionable ‚Äústrategy‚Äù and more of a need to upgrade units to win.

The game play is incredibly redundant and similar strategies are only made more effective through upgrades. (Make you feel the need to pay to get ahead)

One of many phone games I feel this way about.

The final boss is just a conglomeration of all the worst mechanics of the game. Can‚Äôt pick your units, insta kill/tracking projectiles, boss can regen to full health, unskipable cutscenes, knockback effect found nowhere else in the game, and it‚Äôs basically an escort mission (On top of that the escort is slow??) is the best you guys could come up with??

 The only reason the final boss is difficult is because you put all the worst parts of the game together and called it a boss.

Otherwise great game, but my god beating nexus was 0 fun.

The game is great, four or five stars for sure. lots of content definitely money‚Äôs worth. However, I can only play for a little bit as it is a battery killer. I have an iphone 11 and it drained 60% of my battery in 1 hour of playing.

I absolutely love all of the Ironhide games and this one was pretty different from the usual kingdom rush. I love the graphics, as usual, they did not disappoint. The game has so much variation and skill and really makes you work your brain. I read a couple comments that said they easily beat the whole game in a couple of days. That.. is false. There is no way. I am still on the first set of levels and I find it pretty difficult. I am always making sure I have it set to the easiest difficulty because I need it. This game really challenges you and I don‚Äôt think using money is really going to help you. Good Luck.
It‚Äôs fun but needs new stuff like make everything look cooler or add a hero or add a new world, it‚Äôs your choice.

Simply excellent. The best RTS for iOS / iPad OS. I play it with an iPad Pro 3rd Gen and Trackpad 2. Works perfectly. I like extra touch of adding a pause function while multitasking. This is a must have if you enjoy Starcraft or C&C games. My only request for the dev is more content and more missions. I‚Äôd be willing to pay.

The game is great not too difficult and not too easy. The graphics are the same amazing graphics to kingdom rush which make it better, but I think that it is too short and the scene at the end make you think there is more but there isn‚Äôt if you are going to make it so short make the impossible difficulty actually improbable to complete, add more troops like air troops would be nice you could have mechs, marines, aliens, and planes, and finally make another hero the first one is good but he is not unique he is just a super-powered ranger

This is a paid app. Yet I open it and find a currency I can buy with real money that you need to get single use items that are necessary to complete the game efficiently.  I am appalled.

You cannot trust that the game was designed with a reasonable difficulty curve.  How do you know if you‚Äôre doing well or just spending well?

I will never buy one of your games again.  Be ashamed.

Okay. At first, I really hated this game due to its insane difficulty level, but then I realized I was missing stuff like +ether and +1 teammate checkpoints. Without finding most or all of those, you‚Äôll have zero percent chance of surviving or winning the campaign. Remember to upgrade towers back at the base so baddies don‚Äôt take down your ether mine. Oh and btw - it really helps to play this on an iPad. My two cents are iPhones are too small with so much action and control necessary. Nice job Ironhide!!
What a way to start your day

Maybe a one star is too low, but this game kills me. I love all the kingdom rush games and in each one I‚Äôve beaten every level in the hardest difficulty. But this game, Oh My God. I cant do anything. So I start playing in the middle difficulty thinking oh ok I‚Äôll just get used to this new gameplay. And this goes relatively well. I get through the first 6 levels without too much of a challenge. But the seventh level! I have spent countless hours trying to beat it on the easiest difficulty and still fail. If a game can‚Äôt be beaten by a decently skilled all round gamer on the easiest difficulty, then it‚Äôs way to hard

Thought this was a tower defense style game. It‚Äôs not. It‚Äôs an RTS. And micromanaging is basically impossible in it. And what‚Äôs sad is all it really needs to make it far more manageable is a attack-move option. Or at least a way to stop your squads mid-march.
Def worth the money and i love the references and easter eggs to sci fi movies you can find while playing
I love this game it‚Äôs nostalgic like the playing star craft.

title.label: Buy this game - super worth it

content.label:
This game is super fun and definitely worth the few bucks it costs.

Would love to be able to group units a little easier, but overall the gameplay is pretty intuitive. Love the Starcraft references. It‚Äôs not a hardcore rts, just a fun little phone game.

There are a bunch of heroes you can buy in game, but the heroes that you start with are totally fine. Lots of fun sci-fi easter eggs in the levels. Will probably end up buying a hero or two.

Looking forward to the sequels!

It‚Äôs a good game. But if your expecting to purchase a full game, it‚Äôs not. Just letting you know you‚Äôll have to pay to get the rest. If that‚Äôs something you‚Äôre not into, don‚Äôt buy this game.

For anyone reading this don‚Äôt trust the micro transactions. If you delete the game you won‚Äôt be able to restore the heroes you bought. More importantly this game also forces players to buy the whole game on their newer accounts, should for some reason you had to use a different account for in app purchases. It‚Äôs a corrupt cash grab don‚Äôt waste your money on in app purchases.

Great fun, runs well, offers plenty of playtime and challenge.  The reviews saying it‚Äôs too hard, they just didn‚Äôt figure out how to play correctly (trust me, I thought it was too hard at first until it clicked). Use proper strategy, be aware of where enemies can spawn from, and don‚Äôt always just lump your separate squads together into one huge unit.

I that this game would be fun because I LOVE the Kingdom rush games so I downloaded it I was really excited to play it but when I started the first level I was a little disappointed I thought the controls would be the same it got a little boring after a while this game is not like Kingdom rush

If you‚Äôre like me, you were probably hesitant about getting this game. Trust me; it‚Äôs so worth the money. Play if you love KingdomRush. Play if you love gaming in general.!just get the game and enjoy its wonderful game mechanics and excellent art.
Love the game, it‚Äôs one of my favorites for my phone. Had some problems restoring my purchases, took them a while but, it was fixed. My faith in customer services is restored
I wasn't into strategy games until i played Iron Marines! Worth every penny, the atmosphere the gameplay this game is a masterpiece!

This game is honestly amazing, at first I didn‚Äôt wanted to play it cause I‚Äôm used to the kingdom rush Series, but once I played it, it was amazing, and I have to say, this is better than kingdom rush tbh

I like this game but as with other games from the same company, I am frustrated that when I open the game after a break I find that the level has restarted. This is almost a dealbreaker for me. Some of these rounds take a long time and I just don‚Äôt always have that much time in one chunk to play.
I am enjoying it so far but I take away one star because I can‚Äôt create my own matches in a sandbox like any other strategy game, it seems that there is only a campaign and that‚Äôs it

Ever since the kingdom rush games, I‚Äôve been a big fan of Iron Hide. The art, Easter eggs, and overall gameplay makes them so fun! I‚Äôve always wanted to get Iron Marines, but always forgot about it. I finally got it this Christmas and have fallen in love!

This game involves strategy and synergy of troops and heroes. The enemies and objectives make it challenging, but also make you never want to put it down. I have finished the game on casual and am now about to try impossible. A big jump, but it has so far been enjoyable!

This game is so good, but is shadowed by the Kingdom Rush Series. A wonderful game series, but I think Iron Marines should get some more love too. Maybe at the end of the kingdom rush series, a new Iron Marines can be made. It would make lots of people happy!

All I‚Äôm saying is that this game is so incredibly wonderful, and has peaked the interest of so many people! At kingdom rushes inevitable end, maybe Iron Marines can pick up as the new Iron Hide series.

Either way, stupendous game, 5 stars, would love a sequel. Thanks for reading this!
